PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-08002019-06-16,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActCanada Not-for-profit Corporations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS in order to better align service fees under the Not-for-profit Corporations Act (NFP Act) with the cost of delivering the related services and to achieve the following principles and objectives as identified by Corporations Canada and the Government of Canada: (1) encourage the use of low-cost service delivery methods: (2) promote compliance with the NFP Act; and (3) support greater corporate transparency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0224 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
